attributes.action: Stop letting utility companies have high profits
attributes.additional_details: We want to government to stand up for the people and not for the companies
attributes.background: We understand that profits are needed but when the UK people have to decide to feed their families or to turn on a light/heating. The profits are extortion

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about the profits that some companies are making and the impact of high costs on people. However, we're not exactly sure what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take to stop utility companies from having high profits. You could start a new petition explaining what you'd like to happen. For example, you could start a petition asking the UK Government to increase its current energy profits tax. 

You may also wish to sign this petition calling for energy companies to be nationalised: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621719

You can find out more about nationalisation and how it works in this House of Commons Library note: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cbp-8325/

You can find out more about the Government's Energy profits levy here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/cost-of-living-support/energy-profits-levy-factsheet-26-may-2022 

You can find out more about energy prices including support available and how and why energy prices are changing in this House of Commons Library note: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cbp-9491/
